attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Londoners were charged a record £1.3bn in the 2004/2005 tax year, compared to just £165m in 1997. The Chancellor's money-spinning stealth tax has soared by nearly 50% in a year, with buyers in the South East of England bearing the brunt.  

The Current Rates:
0% up to £125,000
1% for £125,001 to £250,000
3% for £250,001 to £500,000
4% over £500,001

With house prices increasing faster than income, stamp duty tax is simply unfair.  This petition proposes to scrap paying the government just because we buy a house.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
